name: F1 Calendar Template
description:
Designed an editable F1 Calendar that can be used to create wallpapers for mobile and desktop devices. I update and use this calendar each F1 season as my main wallpaper on my phone.


I created a component system to make it easier to add new tracks and edit the layout each season as well. I also added a preview screen to view your design on an iPhone lock screen while editing it realtime.


Let me know if there's anything else you think should be included and I'll make the updates.
